personal.name: Sai Ranga M
personal.title: Software Engineer | AI/ML Specialist
personal.tagline: Building production-grade AI systems that solve real-world problems at scale

summary.short: Full-stack backend and ML infrastructure engineer with 4+ years architecting production-grade AI systems, distributed data pipelines, and LLM deployment infrastructure at scale.
summary.extended: Expert in designing real-time systems that balance performance optimization with ML model serving—orchestrating microservices, vector databases, and streaming architectures to unlock AI capabilities in mission-critical financial and enterprise environments. Proven track record of reducing latency by 40%, improving model accuracy by 19%, and processing millions of transactions daily.

highlights: Architected graph database platform using Neo4j and VueJS with ColPali and LangChain vector embeddings for construction document relationships, achieving 80%+ query accuracy, sub-500ms response times, and 150+ documents/minute throughput
Developed YOLO and ColPali-based automated construction document parsing system, reducing manual review time by 70% and improving bid accuracy for construction projects

Deployed fine-tuned LLM models using LoRA and MLflow for construction-specific document understanding with prompt engineering optimization, improving extraction accuracy from 72% to 91% while reducing inference costs by 35%
Implemented real-time document analysis pipeline processing 150+ documents per minute with AWS infrastructure, supporting project bidding decisions worth $10M+ annually
Built distributed fraud detection system with FastAPI/Spring Boot processing 2M+ daily transactions, reducing detection latency by 40% via Kafka/Redis caching architecture
Enabled real-time trading decisions with sub-second market data pipeline using Kafka/Spark streaming architecture processing 500K+ events per second

Deployed XGBoost and LightGBM risk scoring models to production via Kubernetes, achieving 99.99% uptime serving 50K+ daily predictions, reducing false positive rate by 35% and improving risk assessment accuracy

Architected scalable microservices in Java/Spring Boot supporting portfolio analytics across billions of financial data points, reducing query latency by 40% (from 3.2s to 1.9s) and enabling real-time risk exposure monitoring for 500+ portfolio managers
Optimized PostgreSQL queries and Redis caching strategy, boosting database cluster throughput by 60% and reducing cache miss rate from 12% to 3%
Implemented end-to-end tracing with OpenTelemetry and Datadog, reducing Mean Time To Resolution (MTTR) by 65% from 45 to 15 minutes for production incidents affecting 10K+ users
Led performance optimization initiatives that saved $200K+ annually in infrastructure costs through efficient resource utilization and query optimization
Expanded platform reach to 500+ QSR (Quick Service Restaurant) clients by building Django REST APIs for inventory and menu synchronization across multiple delivery platforms

Architected internal QA automation platform using Spring Boot with RabbitMQ webhook integration, achieving 91% test reliability and reducing manual testing efforts by 30%, saving $65K annually in operational costs
Administered CI/CD pipeline enhancements using Jenkins and Docker through automated Python and Bash scripts, reducing deployment time by 45%
Led migration from monolithic Django application to microservices architecture, cutting deployment time by 75% and enabling independent scaling of 12+ services
Built real-time analytics pipeline with Elasticsearch processing 100K+ daily orders, reducing P95 query latency from 3s to 1.2s and providing actionable insights to restaurant partners
Implemented distributed caching strategy with Redis, improving API response times by 60% for high-traffic endpoints serving 500K+ daily requests

Engineered Java EE REST APIs integrating Razorpay and PayPal payment gateways, processing 50K+ monthly transactions worth $2M+, reducing payment failures by 35% through circuit breaker patterns and retry mechanisms
Improved ETL pipeline throughput by 12% for 2M+ daily records using Java/SQL Server optimization, achieving 99.5% data quality SLA and $50K annual savings through query performance tuning
Developed comprehensive API documentation using Swagger/OpenAPI specifications and deployment runbooks, reducing new developer onboarding time by 60% across 25-person distributed engineering team
Collaborated with cross-functional teams across India, US, and Europe using Agile/Scrum methodologies, delivering 15+ software modules on schedule with 95% sprint completion rate
Integrated SAP ECC (MM/SD modules) with Java REST services using Cloud SDK and IDoc protocols for real-time data synchronization across enterprise systems
Delivered SQL-based KPI dashboards and lightweight ABAP/BAPI enhancements for improved business visibility, reducing manual reporting time by 40%

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science and Engineering

cloud: AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, SageMaker, RDS, CloudWatch)

projects.name: SwarmOS: Production-Grade Multi-Agent Orchestration Platform
projects.description: Enterprise-ready multi-agent control plane implementing competitive-collaborative debate mechanisms for AI agent coordination with distributed orchestration, memory persistence, and human-in-the-loop governance
highlights: Architected distributed multi-agent system supporting 10+ specialized agents operating concurrently with <500ms task handoff latency
Implemented dual-memory architecture (conversation + vector DB) enabling persistent agent context and 95%+ task completion accuracy
Built enterprise-grade observability with LangSmith tracing, reducing agent debugging time by 60%
Deployed with Docker/K8s, automated CI/CD, and human-in-the-loop governance for compliance workflows
Integrated multi-model routing (Claude for analysis, GPT-4 for creative tasks) with 99%+ error recovery rate

projects.name: DocIntel: Production Document Understanding with Optimized ColPali
projects.description: Real-time document intelligence system with fine-tuned ColPali vision-language model, quantization pipeline, and Neo4j knowledge graph integration for enterprise-scale document processing
highlights: Fine-tuned ColPali on financial documents achieving 94% extraction F1 score (vs 87% baseline)
Implemented INT8 quantization pipeline reducing model size 4x while maintaining 98% accuracy, cutting inference costs by 75%
Built Neo4j knowledge graph integration for document relationship mapping, enabling complex multi-document queries
Deployed on AWS SageMaker with autoscaling, processing 1000+ pages/hour at <$0.01/document cost
Integrated MLflow model registry with automated A/B testing and drift monitoring pipeline

projects.name: AdaptiveRAG: Production RAG System with MCP and GraphRAG
projects.description: Advanced Retrieval-Augmented Generation system implementing Anthropic's Model Context Protocol with hybrid retrieval (vector + graph + BM25), adaptive chunking, and systematic evaluation using RAGAS framework
highlights: Implemented Model Context Protocol (MCP) for standardized LLM-tool integration, enabling seamless multi-tool agent workflows
Built hybrid retrieval combining vector search + BM25 + graph traversal, achieving 0.87 NDCG@10 (vs 0.72 baseline vector-only)
Created adaptive chunking pipeline improving answer relevance by 35% on domain-specific queries
Deployed with query complexity routing, reducing average cost per query by 60% while maintaining quality
Integrated RAGAS evaluation suite with automated regression testing for systematic quality measurement

projects.name: Open Source Contributions
projects.description: Contributor to backend systems and infrastructure for various open source foundations.
highlights: Implemented Data validation, Redis caching and pagination mechanisms in Bikespace API, delivering 1/3 reduction in fallbacks
Standardized inconsistent module ID conventions in Spring RTS platform, enhancing cross-platform system compatibility
Devised Nginx Kubernetes Ingress codebase by removing deprecated flags and streamlining configuration
Resolved file size representation by implementing binary-based calculations(log2), ensuring accurate storage measurements
Composed real-time data warehouse analytics through access counter incrementing, optimizing access pattern tracking

projects.name: Graduate Student Operations
projects.description: Managed technical operations and student support for 15+ academic spaces at Clemson University.
highlights: Provided technical support and IT mentoring across 15+ academic spaces, facilitating student learning and conferences
Assisted in streamlining operations across campus technical spaces through system management and maintenance workflows
